user_instruction: 'Compose an email to Michael Harris (michael.harris@parchmentprose.com) with my thoughts on the manuscript. You can check out my Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
To: Jane [jane@parchmentprose.com]  
Subject: Quick Access to Your Notion Notes on the Manuscript  

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. I’m pulling together all current feedback on the novel and heard you’ve organized your latest thoughts in Notion. Could you please grant me view access to that page (or send over an export/summary) at your earliest convenience? Having your detailed notes will help me incorporate your suggestions promptly.

Thank you so much, and let me know if there’s anything you need from me.

Best,  
Michael

final_output:
To: Jane [jane@parchmentprose.com]  
Subject: Quick Access to Your Notion Notes on the Manuscript  

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. I’m pulling together all current feedback on the novel and heard you’ve organized your latest thoughts in Notion. Could you please grant me view access to that page (or send over an export/summary) at your earliest convenience? Having your detailed notes will help me incorporate your suggestions promptly.

Thank you so much, and let me know if there’s anything you need from me.

Best,  
Michael
